title: Application for Registration as a Citizen of Botswana to His Excellency For Businnessess

description.short: An application for registration as a citizen of Botswana addressed to His Excellency.
description.long: This is an application for registration as a citizen of Botswana addressed to His Excellency. The application is intended for individuals who meet the eligibility criteria and wish to be registered as citizens of Botswana. It is a formal and respectful way of submitting the application to the highest authority. The application process requires the submission of specific information and supporting documents, such as proof of residency, background information, and any other required documentation. This application is subject to review and approval by the relevant authorities, ensuring that the applicants meet the criteria for citizenship registration in Botswana. Upon approval, the applicant will be registered as a citizen of Botswana and granted all the rights and responsibilities associated with citizenship.

shortName: Registration as Citizen (To His Excellency) for Businesses
ministry: Ministry of Labour and Home Affairs
